mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_room (chat_id, member_num, trainer_num, topic) VALUES (chat_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{member_num}, #{trainer_num}, TO_CHAR('topic_'||chat_id_seq.CURRVAL))
mapper.select: SELECT cr.member_num, cr.topic, ui.name, ui.profile, cm.content, MAX(to_char(cm.times, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) as times FROM chat_room cr JOIN USER_INFO ui ON cr.member_num = ui.id JOIN chat_message cm ON cr.topic = cm.topic WHERE cr.trainer_num = #{trainer_num} GROUP BY cr.member_num, cr.topic, ui.name, ui.profile, cm.content
SELECT message_id, topic, content, send_type, to_char(times, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as times FROM chat_message WHERE topic=#{topic} ORDER BY times ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message (message_id, topic, content, send_type, times) VALUES (message_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{topic}, #{content}, #{send_type}, SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM (SELECT cr.*, cm.* FROM chat_room cr, chat_message cm WHERE cr.topic=cm.topic AND cr.trainer_num=#{trainer_num})
